entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. Blowing snow this morning. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 near the Richardson mountains this morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 6 May 2023
